quote: Dreams do come true, if we only wish hard enough, You can have anything in life if you will sacrifice everything else for it. – James Matthew Barrie
fact: The sound of E.T. walking was made by someone squishing her hands in jelly.
joke: What's the difference between a poorly dressed man on a tricycle and a well dressed man on a bicycle? Attire.
